job_title: Professor of Voice in Memphis, TN
cons: None at all. Love this school.

review_title: Ok workplace, if you want to have multiple roles
pros: Work life is laid back.  No one micro manages you, but it does depend on your supervisor. Benefits are good and is 100% paid by the college.  Staff are friendly.
cons: Salary is heavily dependent on student enrollment.  If the college doesn't make it's quota expect a pay cut.  No budget  or opportunity for professional development.  Small staff means having more than 4-5 roles.  No clear communication from upper management to faculty or other members of staff about budget (what we have submitted and need for our department).  Lots of things get put on the back burner.  Upper leadership will ask you to do things that are outside of your credentials and experience. Attitude can be "just get it done."
